Class Broker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Broker
  • public class Broker
extends java.lang.Object
    Does some action based on the Action type. Actions consists of publishing given Actions to Subscribers and managing subscriptions to the topics with help of SubscriptionManager.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER  
      private SubscriptionManager subscriptionManager

      Logs the error message and stack trace that the given exception contains.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Broker

        public Broker()

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute​(Action action,
                    Subscriber subscriber)
        Executes an action based on the Action type. Action can represents publishing a message, subscription and unsubscription from the given topic and unsubscription from all topics that exists.
        Parameters:
        action - Based on the Action.TYPE some action is executed. Action also contains additional data, such as topic and some data. Should not be null.
        subscriber - Subscriber for which given action is performed. Should not be null.

      • publish

        private void publish​(java.lang.String topic,
                     java.lang.String message,
                     Subscriber sender)
        Publishes messages to all the Subscribers that are subscribed to the topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic for which subscribed Subscribers receives message. Should not be null or formed only from space characters.
        message - Data that should be send to all Subscribers of the topic.
        sender - Represents Subscriber that has published the message. Will not receive self-published messages.

      • subscribe

        private void subscribe​(java.lang.String topic,
                       Subscriber subscriber)
        Creates the subscription to the given topic with the help of a SubscriptionManager. That means that the subscriber will receive all messages that will be published to the topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic to which subscription will be created.
        subscriber - Subscriber that will start receiving messages to the topic.

      • unsubscribe

        private void unsubscribe​(java.lang.String topic,
                         Subscriber subscriber)
        Unsubscribe the subscriber from the given topic with the help of a SubscriptionManager. That means that the subscriber will stop receiving messages that are published to the topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic from which subscription will be removed.
        subscriber - Subscriber that will stop receiving messages published to the topic.

      • unsubscribeAll

        private void unsubscribeAll​(Subscriber subscriber)
        Unsubscribe the subscriber from all topics with the help of a SubscriptionManager. That means that the subscriber will stop receiving messages that are published to any of the available topics.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - Subscriber that will stop receiving messages published to any of the available topics.

      • onError

        private void onError​(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Logs the error message and stack trace that the given exception contains. If the give exception is null, a message explaining that the given exception is null is logged.
        Parameters:
        exception - Exception that has occurred and contains info about error message and stack trace. Should not be null.
